com.hero.rssreader

类 Adapters.CursorTransformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hero.rssreader.Adapters.CursorTransformation
  • 封闭类:
    Adapters

    public abstract static class Adapters.CursorTransformation
extends java.lang.Object

    Interface used to transform data coming out of a android.database.Cursor before it is bound to a android.view.View.

    Transformations are used to transform text-based data (in the form of a String), or to transform data into a resource identifier. A default implementation is provided to generate resource identifiers.

    另请参阅:
    android.database.Cursor, Adapters.CursorBinder

        参数:
        context - The context associated with this transformation.

    • 方法详细资料

      • transform

        public abstract java.lang.String transform(Cursor cursor,
                         int columnIndex)

        Transforms the specified Cursor column into a String. The transformation can simply return the content of the column as a String (this is known as the identity transformation) or manipulate the content. For instance, a transformation can perform text substitutions or concatenate other columns with the specified column.

        参数:
        cursor - The cursor that contains the data to transform.
        columnIndex - The index of the column to transform.
        返回:
        A String containing the transformed value of the column.

      • transformToResource

        public int transformToResource(Cursor cursor,
                      int columnIndex)

        Transforms the specified Cursor column into a resource identifier. The default implementation simply interprets the content of the column as an integer.

        参数:
        cursor - The cursor that contains the data to transform.
        columnIndex - The index of the column to transform.
        返回:
        A resource identifier.
